Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires hotel, motel and inn keepers to offer condoms for sale to registered guests
Summary: Requires hotel, motel and inn keepers to offer, in the registration office, condoms or similar prophylactic devices for sale to registered guests of such hotel, motel or inn.
LawCode: Add ยง204-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring hotels, motels and innkeepers to offer condoms for sale to registered guests
